author: Zughy

game.author: Minetest
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
The texture pack is 32 colors only, more exactly the ones in the [Zughy32 palette](https://lospec.com/palette-list/zughy-32). Also, the default pack is more than five times lighter than the original!

### Officially provides
* Beds
* Bones
* Bucket
* Carts  
* Default  
* Doors
*  Flowers
*  NextGen Bows
*  Wool
*  (chess only) X-Decor-libre
---
	
**Other mods done by contributors (that maybe someday I'll tweak)**  

* (partly) 3D Armor
* Butterflies
* Dye
* Fire
* Fireflies
* (partly) Mesecons
* Screwdriver
* Stairs
* Tnt
* Vessels
* Xpanes

You can try the texture pack by joining the server A.E.S.
name: soothing32
short_description: Lightweight yet aesthetically pleasing texture pack. Seriously, it could run on a toaster!
title: Soothing 32
